Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.6 Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka » 10.6.7 Pañhāvāra
10.6.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Mahantaraduka
Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
237.
2907Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye tīṇi…pe…  namagge tīṇi, nasampayutte dve, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
<< Suddhaup10.6.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma >>
